text: 11.23-24 Apo 2.41, 5.14, 6.5, 11.21, 13.43 Ne bɨ tep, God Kawnan nop bak lek, Jisas nop kɨles gɨl gos lɨnɨgak. Ak nɨm, man Adiyok amjakɨl, God binɨb okok ayɨp nep yek nɨŋɨd, nop tep gak. Kɨlop takaw ogɨnap sek agñɨtep gɨlɨg agak, God nop dɨpɨm ak, ma kelɨgɨnɨmɨb agak. Nop chɨgɨl nep yenɨmɨb agak. Wog anɨb ak gaknɨŋ, binɨb kuŋay yɨbɨl Jisas nop gos lɨnɨgɨlak.
